alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hutchinson; Moore; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:31AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Armstrong, northeastern Randall, Carson, southwestern Hutchinson, southwestern Gray, eastern Potter, western Donley and southeastern Moore Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 331 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Amarillo to Claude to 14 miles northeast of Vigo Park. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Borger, Panhandle, Clarendon, Claude, Fritch, Stinnett, White Deer, Groom, Skellytown, Howardwick, Sanford, Washburn, Palo Duro Canyon, Goodnight, Kingsmill, Lake Meredith, Greenbelt Lake and Pantex. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Carson; Donley; Gray; Hutchinson; Moore; Palo Duro Canyon; Potter; Randall
